original_text: Babylon will become a heap of stones. Wild animals will live there. People will see that it is a disgusting place, and they will laugh at it. Nobody will live there. Babylon will become a heap of stones. Wild animals will live there. People will see that it is a disgusting place, and they will laugh at it. Nobody will live there. Babylon will become a heap of stones. Wild animals will live there. People will see that it is a disgusting place, and they will laugh at it. Nobody will live there. Babylon will become a heap of stones.
korean_text: 바벨론이 돌무더기가 되어서 승냥이의 거처와 혐오의 대상과 탄식 거리가 되고 주민이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Babylon will become a heap of stones
People will see that it is a disgusting place
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그것이 혐오스러운 곳이라고 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they will laugh at it
